snippet: The Chinese leader is visiting to observe a change of government and the 15th anniversary of the handover of the former British colony to Beijing.
abstract: President Hu Jintao of China encounters a mood of public mistrust as he arrives in Hong Kong to observe a change of government and the 15th anniversary of the return of Hong Kong to Chinese sovereignty; pressing economic worries have contributed to public frustration that has been building for months, both with Beijing and with the political and economic system in Hong Kong.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese leader is visiting to observe a change of government and the 15th anniversary of the handover of the former British colony to Beijing.

headline.seo: Hong Kong Mood Is Dour as President Hu Jintao Returns
headline.main: Hong Kong in Dour Mood as Chinese Leader Makes Return Visit
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong in Dour Mood as Chinese Leader Makes Return Visit
